title: (x) Raiders of the Lost Ark movie frame - Open Kapitalen, Eurostile Extd {Angel, Mike Y}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202194048im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/mail_4277.jpg)

 [‹ Elaborate Didot - Font Creator?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202194048/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36255 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Helion AG" logo semi serif - Jaguar JC {Angel} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202194048/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32935 "Go to next forum topic")
author: zzi

comments.content:
’OF THE LOST ARK’ is [Eurostile Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202194048/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/eurostile/), of course.

- Mike Yanega

Thanks. It’s hard to tell because it’s a frame capture but I added a touch of the BG color to the font color.

I still don’t know why this site doesn’t have a favicon. Thanks again.
